climatePledgeFriendly.details: Pre-owned Certified: Electronics products are inspected, cleaned and (if applicable) repaired to excellent functional standards. Buying Pre-owned extends a product's life, reducing e-waste and raw material extraction.

features: This Certified Refurbishd product is tested and certified to look and work like new. The refurbishing process includes functionality testing, basic cleaning, inspection, and repackaging. The product ships with all relevant accessories, and may arrive in a generic box. Only select sellers who maintain a high performance bar may offer Certified Refurbishd products on Amazon.com
Keyboard, Power Cord, and Mouse included.
body.description: Dell Optiplex 780 SFF Desktop PC - Intel Core 2 Duo 3.0GHz 4GB 160GB Windows Pro 10(64bit) (Certified Refurbished). Upgrade option to Windows 10 64 Bit OS.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Replaced my old tower perfectly, for a reasonable price. Quick delivery. Sorry for my late responce . Wanted to wait to make sure it would continue to work. It does!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great purchase, works very well!
reviews.reviewText: This refurbished desktop runs great! It was purchased to replace my old desktop (similar model) which was fried by a lightening strike. I just need something to run a few business applications and general simple household software. I especially appreciate the fact that it comes simply with Windows 7 Pro and Explorer - no junk added on. I was easily able to load all of my software that I need for daily use, and set it up just like my old one. I am planning on updating with Windows 10, but haven't done so,as of this review. Hopefully that will run just as smoothly. I will be purchasing another from this seller for my son, who is a student.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars A huge disappointment
reviews.reviewText: I was trying to buy a windows 7 pc for game playing. I need windows 8.1 or older windows to be able to play a number of my older games. So i came on here to buy an older windows 7 pc and they put windows 10. Why would anyone pay this much for an obselete computer unless they wanted the older operating system. If you put it in the system specs as windows 7 then make sure it is windows 7. A complete waste of time. probably just get a refund and go else where to buy the pc i want.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Did not receive the computer pictured or described
reviews.reviewText: Did not receive the computer pictured or described. Item was listed as a Dell Optiplex 780, and that is what was and is pictured on the product page. What I received is a Dell Optiplex XE. Similar but not the same. Also, the product page confusingly indicates in one place that it would come with Windows 7 and in another place that the computer would come with Windows 10 installed. This is the kind of missleading and confusing information I expect from sellers on ebay, not on Amazon. I didn't attempt to return the PC, because it was needed as a replacement for an actual Dell Optiplex 780 that recently died and it is just good enough, but I'm not pleased about it. Having Windows 7 instead of 10 has lead to multiple issues with the computers user.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Adding a photo not necessay, as what they ship you might be a different version of the Dell Optiplex 780. The one I received has some weird metal covering right on top of the memory, so I can't add memory for now. Reason I bought it: I have tons of code going back to 1990. So this 4GB memory 160GB HD bruiser allowed me to install my paid version of VB6 onto the $109 Windows 7 machine with a legitimate license. I find that funny: Windows was expensive for some of us hackers back then, but now you can get Windows 7 for basically nothing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars good value desktop
reviews.reviewText: Computer arrived with Windows 7 Pro but after emailing seller and being told about ability to upgrade to Windows 10, all is well. Very happy with this Dell desktop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 20, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I am very happy with the computer. It booted up fine after following the setup instructions.I am a ham radio operator and I am using it for the digital modes for FT8, FT4, and PSK31, and alogging program. The Digital software loaded and works fine. The support for this refurbishedcomputer was fantastic. I recommend this product for anyone looking for an alternative to purchasinga new computer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars JSM is a Great Vendor.
reviews.reviewText: Next time I go for a PC I will select JSM as the vendor!!!!! I have purchased from them before directly via my Company.Previous to this I ordered a PC from Amazon, didn't work, returned it. A replacement came. It was scratched but I was going to keep it, after going thru initial setup it worked , but the DVD tray would not open. The cover was bent in at that point thus binding the DVD tray. Returned it for credit. Thankfully it was credited.
